sentences.english: Airbus delivered 18 of its A380 superjumbo last year.
sentences.chinese: 空中客車交付18架其A380超巨型飛機去年。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effects of surgical treatment of giant clival chordoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討巨型斜坡中線區脊索瘤的手術治療方法。

sentences.english: Lunar olivine was created by great volcanoes called fire fountains, which sprayed superheated lava into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 月之橄欖石產生於名爲“火噴泉”的巨型火山。

sentences.english: The web may be a combined effort of social cobweb spiders.
sentences.chinese: 巨型蜘蛛網可能是由羣居的蜘蛛共同織造成。

sentences.english: In the end, the mammoth dam had an oversized impact on world opinion.
sentences.chinese: 最終，巨型水壩對世界輿論產生了非常大的影響。

sentences.english: There were three jumbos on the concrete apron.
sentences.chinese: 水泥停機坪上有三架巨型飛機。

sentences.english: Tiny models could be used as spies while gargantuan versions served as mobile armor.
sentences.chinese: 微小的型號能用於偵察，而巨型版本可充當移動機甲。

sentences.english: In addition, they can use giant folding fan to decorate their house and so on.
sentences.chinese: 此外，他們還可以使用巨型摺扇來裝飾他們的房子等。

sentences.english: Earlier on we had the incredible hulk dog, Wendy the Whippet.
sentences.chinese: 早先，我們見識了難以置信的巨型狗小靈狗溫迪。

sentences.english: The game was played on vast walled and banked playing areas.
sentences.chinese: 比賽在寬闊有圍牆的比賽場巨型。

sentences.english: This one, for example, is a drill. A big one.
sentences.chinese: 例如，這個，一個鑽牀，巨型的。

sentences.english: The processes of preheating and welding of super scale penstocks were detailed.
sentences.chinese: 本文詳細敘述了巨型壓力鋼管的預熱裝配和焊接過程。

sentences.english: It has to be tall because it is like a giant block and tackle
sentences.chinese: 井架必須很高，因爲它像一個巨型滑輪組。

sentences.english: So trees have to be planted in massive concrete tubs of soil sunk into the ground.
sentences.chinese: 所以，要種樹就得先往地裏置入巨型土盆。

sentences.english: It's super-ultra-mega efficient and currently uses about 30KB per hour.
sentences.chinese: 這是超級超巨型效率和目前使用約30KB每小時。

sentences.english: A genre of Chinese painting which uses color paints and ink.
sentences.chinese: 《荷塘香遠》是一幅巨型彩墨畫。

definition: human shape/in human form/of human appearance/doll/puppet
